captions.text: Fear…..
Is not real
The only place that fear can exist
Is in our thoughts of the future…
It is a product of our imagination
Causing us to fear things that do not at present
And may not ever exist
So whatever it is that you are trying to achieve in life
The critical components is getting things done
See things are going to happen all of us, and I strongly believe this
Doesn't matter what happens to you
What matters most is what happens in the end
But when they happen it can make you better
Or they can make you bitter
When you are not clear on what you want
Like...
You get up whenever you feel like it
You have no drive, you have no passion
People ask me E
Where does your passion comes from?
Where do your drive come from?
I KNOW WHAT I WANT
Every single day I wake up
BOM!
And I go and pursue
Every single day
Failure comes in all the little things
Its failure to make the call
Its failure to check the books
Its failure to say I’m sorry
Its failure to push yourself to do things psychically
That you don’t want to do
In all those little failures day after day
come together into one day some cataclysmic event happens
and you blame the event happen because
You missed all the little stuff
I’m just simply saying to you
Take those three magic words and live them
Raise your standard
Every negative situation contains
The possibility for something positive
An opportunity
It is how you look at it that matters
Our lack of resources can be an advantage
Forcing you to be more inventive
With the little that you have
Losing a battle can allow you to frame yourself
As the sympathetic underdog
Do not let fears make you wait for a better moment
Or become conservative
If there are circumstances you cannot control
Make the best of them
It's the ultimate alchemy
To transform all such negatives
Into advantages and power
Motivation is like a blessing
It sounds kind of funny
But it’s like a blessing
And basically....
As you go through life on your journey
Different things will come up
That motivates you
and you'll find motivation will become renewed
At times and will wane at times
And so what you want to do is actually proactively
Put yourself into situations where you are likely to become motivated
Every day I demand more from myself
Than anybody else can humanly expect
I’m not competing with somebody else
I’m competing with what I’m capable of
Live for nothing....
Or die for something….
Your call
Subtitles by the Amara.org community

comments.text:
I focused my attention on the two people I find fascinating guys. Bruce Lee 
and Sly Stallone both their stories personal and their work are inspiring 
to me and interesting. The common denominator is they took action. They 
never waited for the perfect moment, as we all know, it never comes. Hope 
you enjoy. Like, Share, Subscribe. Comment on who you guys would like me to 
base the next video on, or what topic. Peace AM team...x﻿
